mapper.insert: insert into board_like(seq_like, seq_board, user_email) values((select nvl(max(seq_like), 0) + 1 from board_like), #{seq_board}, #{user_email})
mapper.delete: delete from board_like where seq_board = #{seq_board} and user_email = #{user_email}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board_like where seq_board = #{seq_board} and user_email = #{user_email}
